title: How has Donald Trump changed the world for the better? - Quora

response.answer_text: He’s proven that honesty is not the best policy, and that because many Americans are so gullible, lying and making up conspiracy theories can be helpful politically. He’s also proven that the United States system of checks and balances doesn’t work when political parties put party over country. He’s allowed racists, bullies, sexists, misogynists, white nationalists and the KKK to come out of the closet. And, he’s made it abundantly clear that ANYONE can become President of the United States. There are absolutely zero qualifications for the job.

The only thing I can possibly think of is that he’s shown a lot of people that it really IS important who winds up in the White House (or other positions of political power.) However, that one bit of “better” is countered by so many tons of “worse” it really doesn’t count for much…
